ashes_of_war.name: Stamp (Upward Cut)
ashes_of_war.description: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Stamp (Sweep)
ashes_of_war.description: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.

location.details: Located near Giant Land Octopus enemies, east side of shore near pillars. Follow glowing prints to find the scarab.

ashes_of_war.name: Wild Strikes
ashes_of_war.description: Swing armaments with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.

location.details: Located between Stormhill Shack Site of Grace and Castleward Tunnel Site of Grace

ashes_of_war.name: Lion's Claw
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.

location.details: Dropped upon defeating the Lion Guardian

ashes_of_war.name: Cragblade
ashes_of_war.description: Reinforce weapon with earth.

location.details: Found on a scarab west of the Impassable Bridge

ashes_of_war.name: Kick
ashes_of_war.description: Push an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance. Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Endure
ashes_of_war.description: Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Ground Slam
ashes_of_war.description: Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.

location.details: Found rolling down the hill west of the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood

ashes_of_war.name: Earthshaker
ashes_of_war.description: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

location.details: Found on the road after Grand Lift of Dectus, near a statue at the first intersection. Only appears at night.

ashes_of_war.name: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
ashes_of_war.description: Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave. Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.

location.details: Trade Remembrance of Hoarah Loux with Enia

ashes_of_war.name: War Cry
ashes_of_war.description: Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Barbaric Roar
ashes_of_war.description: Increase attack power. Strong attacks turn into savage combo attacks.

location.details: Found in the northeast of Lake of Liurnia, near but not accessible from Grand Lift of Dectus

ashes_of_war.name: Braggart's Roar
ashes_of_war.description: Declare your presence with a boastful roar. Raises attack power, defense, and stamina recovery speed.

location.details: Found on Blackguard Big Boggart's weapon after killing him or continuing Dung Eater's questline

ashes_of_war.name: Troll's Roar
ashes_of_war.description: Generate powerful shock wave then slam weapon down

location.details: Found on the top of the big rock just southeast of the Church of Repose in Mountaintops of the Giants

ashes_of_war.name: Spinning Slash
ashes_of_war.description: Skill favored by dexterous warriors. Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Impaling Thrust
ashes_of_war.description: Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a strong thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Piercing Fang
ashes_of_war.description: Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter. Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked

location.details: Acquired from Bloody Finger Hunter Yura

ashes_of_war.name: Repeating Thrust
ashes_of_war.description: Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts. This Skill takes some time to build up, but it is very powerful.

location.details: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry that roams the bridge near Agheel Lake North

ashes_of_war.name: Double Slash
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of superior swordsmen. Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

location.details: Found high above on a very large root in the western end of town

ashes_of_war.name: Sword Dance
ashes_of_war.description: Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.

location.details: Found near the Minor Erdtree in southwest Liurnia

ashes_of_war.name: Unsheathe
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.

location.details: Found in the water in the South East portion of Agheel Lake, North West of the Agheel Lake South Site of Grace

ashes_of_war.name: Quickstep
ashes_of_war.description: Skill prized by the crafty and fleet of foot. Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Bloodhound's Step
ashes_of_war.description: Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep. This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.

location.details: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry at the bridge in front of the Lenne's Rise tower

ashes_of_war.name: Raptor of the Mists
ashes_of_war.description: Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing. If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air.

location.details: Found after aiding Bloody Finger Hunter Yura in defeating his target in Raya Lucaria

ashes_of_war.name: Beast's Roar
ashes_of_war.description: Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-travelling projectile.

location.details: Reward after giving him the fourth Deathroot

ashes_of_war.name: Square Off
ashes_of_war.description: This skill starts with the sword held level. Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust.

location.details: Found rolling around at the edge of a cliff

ashes_of_war.name: Charge Forth
ashes_of_war.description: Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust. Hold to cover a greater distance.

location.details: Found west of the Academy Gate Town site of grace, hanging on the ceiling beneath the bridge

ashes_of_war.name: Spinning Strikes
ashes_of_war.description: Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.

location.details: Can be extracted from Banished Knight's Halberd +8

ashes_of_war.name: Giant Hunt
ashes_of_war.description: Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes. Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.

location.details: Dropped by Night's Cavalry boss in northern Liurnia. Only appears at night.

ashes_of_war.name: Storm Blade
ashes_of_war.description: Your armament is wrapped in a stormy blade that can be fired in rapid succession.

weapon_types: All melee armaments capable of slashing

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Storm Assault
ashes_of_war.description: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.

location.details: Found in Stormveil Castle

ashes_of_war.name: Stormcaller
ashes_of_war.description: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

location.details: Located in the northern section of the castle, past the courtyard and just before the Secluded Cell Site of Grace

ashes_of_war.name: Storm Stomp
ashes_of_war.description: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm.

location.details: Found in the southeastern area of Gatefront Ruins, in an underground room accessed via stairs. Located in the same chest as the Whetstone Knife

ashes_of_war.name: Vacuum Slice
ashes_of_war.description: Lost skill of ancient heroes. Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearing vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.

location.details: Found inside the ruined temple surrounded by waterfalls in Deeproot Depths

ashes_of_war.name: Phantom Slash
ashes_of_war.description: Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry. Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

location.details: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry northeast of the Forbidden Lands Grace

ashes_of_war.name: Determination
ashes_of_war.description: Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.

location.details: Found on the path at the bridge north of Agheel Lake

ashes_of_war.name: Royal Knight's Resolve
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord. Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.

location.details: Found in Altus Plateau, Volcano Manor. From Temple of Eiglay grace, proceed to chapel of Serpent-Men, through second floor door and Imp Statue Door, to a room with cages. Item is on a corpse on east side.

ashes_of_war.name: Glintstone Pebble
ashes_of_war.description: Skill that employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust, performed while the armament is still imbued with glintstone.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Rogier's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Glintblade Phalanx
ashes_of_war.description: Skill that creats glitnstone blades over your head and attack enemies automatically when they get close enough

location.details: Can be extracted from Rogier's Rapier after receiving it from him at Roundtable Hold

ashes_of_war.name: Carian Greatsword
ashes_of_war.description: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Rogier's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Carian Grandeur
ashes_of_war.description: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels.

location.details: Found on the roof of a tall structure in the gardens, accessed by jumping down the cliffs from the Manor's Upper Level

ashes_of_war.name: Spinning Weapon
ashes_of_war.description: Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses. Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Rogier's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Loretta's Slash
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight. Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.

location.details: Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta upon defeat

ashes_of_war.name: Gravitas
ashes_of_war.description: Pierce the ground with your armament to damage foes as a surge of gravity draws them in.

location.details: Found by accessing the back entrance of the Cave of Knowledge (Fringefolk Hero's Grave) from the beach side

ashes_of_war.name: Waves of Darkness
ashes_of_war.description: Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness.

location.details: Trade Remembrance of the Naturalborn with Enia

ashes_of_war.name: Flaming Strike
ashes_of_war.description: Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc. Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike. This will also coat the armament in fire.

location.details: Found in a small graveyard along the south cliffside, behind the castle. From front gate, follow right along cliff towards ballista, past vampire bats, and jump across a small gap to reach the graveyard

ashes_of_war.name: Flame of the Redmanes
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.

location.details: Located in front of the Fort Gael North Site of Grace

ashes_of_war.name: Eruption
ashes_of_war.description: Slamming the armament into the ground will spawn roiling lava which also spouts up upon release.

ashes_of_war.name: Prelate's Charge
ashes_of_war.description: Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge.

location.details: Found south of the Whiteridge Road site of grace, hanging on a tree at the south end of a Fire Monk campsite

ashes_of_war.name: Black Flame Tornado
ashes_of_war.description: Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.

location.details: Dropped by the Godskin Duo Boss inside the Dragon Temple area

ashes_of_war.name: Thunderbolt
ashes_of_war.description: Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning. Can be fired in rapid succession.

location.details: Located northwest of the Avenue Balcony site of grace

ashes_of_war.name: Lightning Slash
ashes_of_war.description: Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock. The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while.

location.details: Found in the middle of an enclosed area just outside the Capital Outskirts

ashes_of_war.name: Lightning Ram
ashes_of_war.description: Skill inspired by tumbling rams. Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.

location.details: Found just south of Sainted Hero's Grave

ashes_of_war.name: Sacred Blade
ashes_of_war.description: Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile. The armament retains its holy essence for awhile.

location.details: Found north of the church, next to a spirit spring

ashes_of_war.name: Prayerful Strike
ashes_of_war.description: Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.

location.details: Found in the lake north of the Sealed Tunnel, traveling through an opening in the rock

ashes_of_war.name: Sacred Ring of Light
ashes_of_war.description: The armament gathers a sacred ring of light and then fires it forward, the skill can be fired in rapid succession.

location.details: Found in the Aeonian Swamps

ashes_of_war.name: Sacred Order
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

location.details: Found just north-west of the Abandoned Coffin Site Of Grace

ashes_of_war.name: Shared Order
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Grant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

location.details: Found next to the Altus Highway Junction Site Of Grace

ashes_of_war.name: Golden Land
ashes_of_war.description: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike

location.details: From the Great Waterfall Crest site of grace, head straight ahead and to the left, behind the Erdtree Avatar who drops the Staff of the Avatar

ashes_of_war.name: Golden Slam
ashes_of_war.description: Jump and slam on ground

location.details: Found northwest of Woodfolk Ruins, near the Altus Plateau Erdtree

ashes_of_war.name: Golden Vow
ashes_of_war.description: Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital. Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.

location.details: Dropped by Mounted Knight when defeated

ashes_of_war.name: Vow of the Indomitable
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the ancient warriors of the Erdtree. Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility.

location.details: Found in the southwestern swampy area of the map

ashes_of_war.name: Holy Ground
ashes_of_war.description: Raise shield to create an Erdtree-consecrated area that continuously restores HP and boosts defense for self and allies inside it

location.details: Found together with Tree Sentinel Armor set

ashes_of_war.name: Poisonous Mist
ashes_of_war.description: Coats the selected armament in poison, slashing spreads the toxic mist forward. The armament retain its poison for a while.

location.details: Found in the Aeonian Swamps

ashes_of_war.name: Poison Moth Flight
ashes_of_war.description: Slash with a poison-infused blade. If the follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significant damage.

location.details: Dropped by Night's Cavalry in Caelid

ashes_of_war.name: Blood Blade
ashes_of_war.description: Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession.

location.details: Found northeast of Erdtree-Gazing Hill, above a pond

ashes_of_war.name: Bloody Slash
ashes_of_war.description: Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.

location.details: Dropped by a Beast Crest Heater Knight fought at the top of the ramparts

ashes_of_war.name: Blood Tax
ashes_of_war.description: Blood Oath skill granted by Lord of Blood. Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.

location.details: Found in a small cave at the northern edge of the blood lake with four blood albinaurics

ashes_of_war.name: Seppuku
ashes_of_war.description: Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.

location.details: Found on the frozen lake next to the 'Freezing Lake' site of grace. Follow the glowing prints and wait for the scarab to come around

ashes_of_war.name: Ice Spear
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni. Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.

location.details: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry patrolling near the broken Gate Town Bridge. Only appears at night time

ashes_of_war.name: Chilling Mist
ashes_of_war.description: Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards. The armament retains its frost for a while.

location.details: Found in the ruins south of Renna's Rise in Three Sisters, Liurnia

ashes_of_war.name: Hoarfrost Stomp
ashes_of_war.description: Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground. The mist applies the frost status effect.

location.details: Found in the shallow body of water southeast of Caria Manor in northern Liurnia

ashes_of_war.name: Spectral Lance
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights. Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.

location.details: Found in Raya Lucaria Academy

ashes_of_war.name: Lifesteal Fist
ashes_of_war.description: Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies. A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build.

location.details: Found along the Caelid Highway

ashes_of_war.name: White Shadow's Lure
ashes_of_war.description: Hold armament in a brief, silent prayer to create a white shadow. The apparition lures in foes of human build who are not in combat, drawing their aggression. Effective on demi-humans even if they are already in a combat state.

location.details: Found northwest of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace, between the grace and Ordina, Liturgical Town. The scarab is followed by five wolves and leaves glowing white tracks

ashes_of_war.name: Assassin's Gambit
ashes_of_war.description: A skill where it masks the player's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound. The ablilty grants near-invisibility and silenced footsteps.

location.details: Available after completing first Volcano Manor contract

ashes_of_war.name: Mighty Shot
ashes_of_war.description: Archery skill performed from an oblique stance. Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.

location.details: Found on the path from Limgrave towards Weeping Peninsula

ashes_of_war.name: Through and Through
ashes_of_war.description: Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance. Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.

location.details: Found just outside Volcano Manor in the Altus Plateau

ashes_of_war.name: Barrage
ashes_of_war.description: Archery skill using a bow held horizontally. Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.

location.details: Found in the narrow channel north of Seethewater River

ashes_of_war.name: Sky Shot
ashes_of_war.description: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from abose when it comes down.

location.details: Found on the cliffs northwest of the Isolated Merchant's Shack

ashes_of_war.name: Enchanted Shot
ashes_of_war.description: A skill where a spiritual essence is gathered within the arrow, allowing it to fly faster than a regular shot arrow. It also changes its trajectory to follow the target.

location.details: Found hiding behind a rock near a brazier

ashes_of_war.name: Rain of Arrows
ashes_of_war.description: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles

location.details: Appears after finding the Redmane Painting location, down the cliffside behind the Minor Erdtree in Caelid

ashes_of_war.name: Parry
ashes_of_war.description: Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Golden Parry
ashes_of_war.description: Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance. Effective even at a slight distance.

location.details: Found in the Capital Outskirts

ashes_of_war.name: Storm Wall
ashes_of_war.description: Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

location.details: Found by falling down from the collapsed bridge north of Stormhill

ashes_of_war.name: Shield Bash
ashes_of_war.description: Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.

location.details: Found under a bridge very close to East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace

ashes_of_war.name: Shield Crash
ashes_of_war.description: Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered. Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards.

location.details: Found in the upper section of Lux Ruins

ashes_of_war.name: Barricade Shield
ashes_of_war.description: Focus your energy into the shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows.

location.details: Dropped by Night's Cavalry in Weeping Peninsula

ashes_of_war.name: Thops's Barrier
ashes_of_war.description: Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

location.details: Appears after delivering the spare Academy Glintstone Key to Thops. Reload the area to spawn the scarab

ashes_of_war.name: Carian Retaliation
ashes_of_war.description: Dispels incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades.

location.details: Found on a balcony above the Manor Lower Level bonfire, accessible by dropping from the southwestern side of Three Sisters

ashes_of_war.name: No Skill
ashes_of_war.description: This armament has no skill. If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead.

location.alternative: Twin Maiden Husks (after giving Bernahl's Bell Bearing)

ashes_of_war.name: Lost Ashes of War
ashes_of_war.description: Empty ashes of war, devoid of any memories of battle. Unable to apply any kind of affinity in their current state, but can be used by Smithing Master Hewg of the Roundtable Hold to recreate other ashes. Thus does the copy pass into becoming the genuine article.

location.details: Found across the Lands Between, including Ellac Greatbridge and Ruins of Unte

ashes_of_war.name: Dryleaf Whirlwind
ashes_of_war.description: This skill represents the pinnacle of Dane's footwork-based martial artistry. Rise into the air with a series of spinning kicks before crashing down with one final strike. Imbues kicking attacks with energy, increasing their range.

location.details: Found on the edge, besides a column and near a waterfall

ashes_of_war.name: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings
ashes_of_war.description: This skill originates from the lifeforms of the Crucible. Grow a golden pair of wings and take to the air before diving down at the foe, weapon first. A spinning attack is performed when wielding a twinblade

location.details: Dropped by Black Knight Edreed upon defeat

ashes_of_war.name: Spinning Gravity Thrust
ashes_of_war.description: A gravity skill honed by the disciples of an Alabaster Lord. Uses gravitational power to hang in the air before rotating the body and charging forward. An additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

location.details: Comes equipped to the Sword lance, obtained by trading Remembrance of the Wild Boar Rider with Enia

ashes_of_war.name: Palm Blast
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the spiritual seekers known as the Dryleaf Sect. Imbues hand with energy before using a palm strike to unleash an explosive blast. The already formidable power and impact can be bolstered by charging the attack.

location.details: Obtained by defeating the Dryleaf Dane Monk after using the 'May The Best Win' emote

ashes_of_war.name: Piercing Throw
ashes_of_war.description: Throw armament with a powerful spin, causing it to bore through foes. When using this skill, the armament can be thrown further than normal and also pierce through enemies

location.details: Found south of the Messmer soldier encampment, east of Giant Crayfish, between a group of Misbegotten on a crumbled column

ashes_of_war.name: Scattershot Throw
ashes_of_war.description: Employ smithing arts to conjure multiple copies of the armament in both hands and throw them all at once. Follow up with an additional input to throw again.

location.details: Found just south of Taylew's Ruined Forge entrance, near a bridge, hanging high on a pillar

ashes_of_war.name: Wall of Sparks
ashes_of_war.description: Scatter perfumed powder in vicinity, producing intense sparks after a brief delay. Can be charged to increase power and range. The properties of the sparks are determined by the perfume bottle used.

location.details: Found on a corpse sitting on the rails, accessed by taking the left lift down from the Storehouse first-floor site of grace

ashes_of_war.name: Rolling Sparks
ashes_of_war.description: Scatter perfumed powder before you, triggering rolling explosions of deadly sparks. The properties of the sparks are determined by the perfume bottle used.

location.details: Found in the camp to the southeast of Shadow Keep, flying high in the air near three perfumers

ashes_of_war.name: Raging Beast
ashes_of_war.description: Step with the swiftness of a beast, leap high, and slash foe from above. Initial step can be taken forward, backward, left, or right. Strong attack allows for a follow-up attack.

location.details: Found by following the path north from the Bridge Leading to the Village Grace, then looking east for a teleporting Teardrop Scarab near the trees

ashes_of_war.name: Savage Claws
ashes_of_war.description: Pounce like a beast to viciously slash into foe with left and right claws.

location.details: Drops from killing Logur the Beast Claw in the forest, southeast of the Gravesite Plain Site of Grace

ashes_of_war.name: Blind Spot
ashes_of_war.description: Leap into close quarters to take advantage of the enemy's blind spot and gore them from the side. Inputs determine which side you strike from. This attack slips below the opponent's guard.

location.details: Comes equipped to the Backhand blades found besides a coffin, in the Inquisitor enemies area

ashes_of_war.name: Swift Slash
ashes_of_war.description: A skill passed down amongst hornsent swordsmen. Take a swift forward step to slice through foes. This sharp strike also fires off a shearing vacuum. Can be charged to increase the skill's power and the distance of the forward step.

location.details: Reward for siding with Hornsent during his fight with Leda at Shadowkeep

ashes_of_war.name: Overhead Stance
ashes_of_war.description: A skill that starts with the blade held high in a ready stance. Execute a normal attack from this stance to step forward and slash downwards, or a strong attack to deliver a series of downward slashes.

location.details: Comes equipped to the Great katana found next to the sleeping Ghostflame Dragon on the lake, west of the site of grace

ashes_of_war.name: Wing Stance
ashes_of_war.description: Calmly assume a right-sided stance. Normal attack triggers a rapid three-slash combination. Strong attack triggers a leaping thrust.

location.details: Found in a tower accessed by jumping over the edge outside Castle Lord's Chamber Site of Grace and following the cliffside

ashes_of_war.name: Blinkbolt
ashes_of_war.description: From a low stance, the body is transformed into a bolt of lightning and charges straight ahead at fulgurous speed. Strong attack performs a lightning-charged leaping slash.

location.details: Found in a hidden room accessed via spike trap in the third spike dropper room with a sorcerer

ashes_of_war.name: Flame Skewer
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of Queelign of the Fire Knights. Enwreathe armament in flame and assume a low stance before skewering the enemy in a single motion. Strong attack unleashes a follow-up flame attack.

location.details: Dropped by Fire Knight Queelign upon defeat

ashes_of_war.name: Savage Lion's Claw
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of the particularly brave, even among the Redmanes. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament. An additional strike may be performed with an additional input.

location.details: Found in a small camp following the left wall path north from the Three-Path Cross site of grace

ashes_of_war.name: Divine Beast Frost Stomp
ashes_of_war.description: A skill which imitates the wrath of the divine beast's dance. Lift a leg up high and stamp it down with great force. Sends a powerful wave of frost straight out along the ground. Can be charged to increase power and range.

location.details: Obtained by trading Remembrance of the Dancing Lion

ashes_of_war.name: Flame Spear
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of Kood, captain of the Fire Knights. Ready weapon for a thrusting attack and unleash a spear of flame straight ahead. Charge the attack to increase damage dealt and distance travelled.

location.details: Dropped by a Fire Knight on the sixth floor, found at the end of a bridge after climbing the moved statues

ashes_of_war.name: Carian Sovereignty
ashes_of_war.description: Skill passed down the Carian royal family. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and bring it down. Additional input follows up with a horizontal sweep. Charge either attack to enhance potency.

location.details: Found on the ceiling of a cave southwest from the cathedral, filled with glintslab fireflies

ashes_of_war.name: Shriek of Sorrow
ashes_of_war.description: Skill utilized by the downtrodden. Scream, causing nearby enemies to flinch, while also recalling deep-seated resentment, boosting attack power based on the amount of HP remaining. The lower the HP, the greater the effect

location.details: Found behind the great tree in the middle of the plaza where Fire Knight Queelign invades

ashes_of_war.name: Ghostflame Call
ashes_of_war.description: Thrust out armament to summon ghostflame. Follow up with a normal attack to set the ground ablaze with ghostflame, or a strong attack to trigger a massive explosion.

location.details: Dropped by the Death Rite Bird

ashes_of_war.name: The Poison Flower Blooms Twice
ashes_of_war.description: Conjures stingers of scarlet rot from below to stab the enemy. Landing a follow-up attack on a foe already inflicted with poison or rot deals massive damage in one fell swoop.

location.details: Found north of the shadowpothead location, across the river

ashes_of_war.name: Igon's Drake Hunt
ashes_of_war.description: Skill of Igon, drake warrior. Ready the bow before unleashing a twisted shot with a great bellow that considerably enhances its power.

location.details: Can be obtained from Igon's Greatbow after defeating Igon in eastern Gravesite Plain, or by helping Igon defeat Bayle The Dread

ashes_of_war.name: Shield Strike
ashes_of_war.description: A skill that uses the shield to attack. Repeated inputs allow for up to three follow-up attacks.

location.details: Found on Dueling Shield and Carian Thrusting Shield

application_locations: Smithing Master Hewg at Roundtable Hold
restrictions: Special armaments cannot receive new skills
features: Can be repeatedly used without cost
No consumable nature unlike previous FromSoftware titles
